description:
The host_ip parameter in the hypervisor description should show the ip of the host that contains such hypervisor.
However, instead of this, it is is showing the ip of the controller.

There was a bug report to include this host_ip information, but after that, it is not providing a accurate information.

Someone that is programming a new functionality could need such an information.
title: The host_ip in the hypervisor description is wrong; it is the controller ip.

comments.content:
The host_ip parameter in the hypervisor description should show the ip of the host that contains such hypervisor.
However, instead of this, it is is showing the ip of the controller.

There was a bug report to include this host_ip information, but after that, it is not providing a accurate information.

Someone that is programming a new functionality could need such an information.

comments.content: Marcelo, the host_ip is correct in my env. I use kvm and the trunk code.

comments.content:
Hi Alex, I saw that host_ip information is from the my_ip parameter in the nova.conf
After I included it in my nova.conf, if start to show the right ip.
